description.full: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-2, 5.1 Surround Sound, HD (High Definition). Upgrade to the full version of Jetpac Refuelled to enjoy a wide spectrum of game features. Provides at least 500% of your recommended daily intake of laser-based alien extinction. Try it now and give your trigger finger a real arcade workout. Also included in the package is the original Jetpac from 1983. Note: PAL TVs must be able to display a 60-Hz signal. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: Purchase the full version of Rare's Jetpac Refuelled to access a wide spectrum of game features. Open up a vast array of levels, engage in battle over Xbox Live, post to the Leaderboards and play for new Achievements. The original 1983 classic is also included.
